Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome, everyone, to this year's <RED><MOJI0>
Harvest Festival</RED>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Allow me to introduce our contestants.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
In the <MOJI3> category...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Next, in the <MOJI3>
category...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #1, <MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME0>,
here to show the farm's finest
<MOJI2>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #2, <MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME0>,
here to show the farm's finest
<MOJI2>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #3, <MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME0>,
here to show the farm's finest
<MOJI2>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #4, <MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME0>,
here to show the farm's finest
<MOJI2>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now, I have the honor of introducing our guest
judge...
<PAGE>
The renowned horticulture expert, Matsuba!

<FACE_MATUBA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Howdy, folks. I'm Matsuba, a specialist in
horticulture. If you're ready to crop 'til you drop,
I'm your man!
<PAGE>
We've got some fantastic entries today, and I'm
going to take a real close look at each and every
one of them.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We will now begin the judging segment of the
competition. Contestants, if you would please
return to the waiting area? Thank you.

<FACE_MATUBA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
...! Hrm? Hrnn...

<FACE_MATUBA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Lessee, lessee...oho! Well, well...my, my!
Hrmmmm...

<FACE_MATUBA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oho! This one's not bad. Not bad at all! A very
fine vegetable. Very fine, indeed!

<FACE_MATUBA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oho, now this is a surprise! Well, well, what a
nice piece of work. Well grown. Well grown,
indeed!

<FACE_MATUBA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Right, right. I see. Okay.

<FACE_MATUBA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Hrnnn... How could someone manage this? My,
my...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ladies and gentlemen, it seems the judging has
concluded. I will now announce the winners.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
In first place, and the winner of this year's
<RED><MOJI0> Harvest Festival</RED>
is...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME4>!
Congratulations!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
In second place is <MOJI1> Farm's
<CHARANAME1>!
<PAGE>
In third place is <MOJI2> Farm's
<CHARANAME2>!
<PAGE>
And finally, in fourth place is <MOJI3> Farm's
<CHARANAME3>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, everyone, on your wonderful
entries!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We will now begin the awards ceremony.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Will the winner of the <MOJI3>
category, <MYNAME>, please step forward?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Also, will the winner of the
<MOJI3> category,
<MYNAME>, please step forward?

<FACE_MATUBA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congrats, congrats! You did some good work. I
was really impressed with the entry you
presented!
<PAGE>
Here's your prize, a <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Keep up the good work.

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh dear. It looks like your bag is full. You'll have
to take something out before I can give you your
prize. Would you, please?

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh well. I will just have your prize delivered to
your home.

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Excellent. Here is your prize.

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh? That's a pity.

<FACE_SAFFRON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You are giving up your prize?

<FACE_MATUBA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now, since you won and all, your brand's going
to become more valuable.
<PAGE>
So your <RED><MOJI3></RED> brand is
now <ITEMNAME1>! Neat, huh?

<FACE_MATUBA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This means you can ship your
<MOJI3> for a little more
money than you got before.
<PAGE>
Keep on keepin' on with the good work, 'kay?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
That is all for this year's <RED><MOJI0> Harvest
Festival</RED>. Ladies and gentlemen, thank you for
coming out today!
